document.full_text: former berkshire hathaway executive david sokol deliberately misled warren buffett when pitching an investment to him, and potentially broke the law in doing so, the company's audit committee said in a scathing report.
document.title: buffett's berkshire says sokol deceived, broke law
lines_and_colors: former berkshire hathaway executive david sokol deliberately misled warren buffett when pitching an investment to him, and potentially broke the law in doing so, the company's audit committee said in a scathing report.
